attributes.action: Seeking URGENT International Aid for the Kerala floods from the UK government
attributes.additional_details:
More than 325 people have lost their lives and 300,000 are now living in 2,000 emergency relief camps following unprecedented heavy rain and flooding in Kerala. Several have been reported missing and national-level relief efforts including that of India’s armed forces are supporting state-wide efforts toward rescue and relief.
The death toll is rising every day and further downpours are forecast for the next couple of days, leading many to fear the situation may get worse.
attributes.background: This petition is on behalf of victims of the flood in Kerala, the southern state of India. The aim is to kindly request you to provide any sort of support (both short + long term) either by financial aid, or by means of food, medical and shelter supplies. Thank you in advance for your consideration.
